text.div: • Include codes from http://loinc.org where STATUS = ACTIVE, CLASSTYPE = 1 and CLASS matches (by regex) CYTO|HL7\.CYTOGEN|HL7\.GENETICS|^PATH(\..*)?|^MOLPATH(\..*)?

name: ResultsPathologyObservationUvIps
title: Results Pathology Observation - IPS
publisher: Health Level Seven International - Patient Care Work Group
description:
Value Set Definition:

 LOINC {STATUS in {ACTIVE}, CLASSTYPE in {1}, CLASS in {CYTO, HL7.CYTOGEN, HL7.GENETICS, MOLPATH, MOLPATH.\*, PATH, PATH.\*}}
